div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"224.ForgotPassword.Step2_ConfirmationMessageReset.label","widget":"Label","props":{"class":"mx-name-label","id":{"$type":"DerivedUniqueIdProperty","widgetId":"224.ForgotPassword.Step2_ConfirmationMessageReset.label"},"caption":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":"We have sent you a confirmation email.\r\nFollow the instructions in the confirmation email to recover your password."}}}],"listenTargets":[]
